title: Frontend Developer
description:
About Us
 
 We at SimplSo empower retail brands to excel in both digital and physical realms by providing expert technology solutions that streamline operations and enhance customer experiences. We specialize in creating custom e\\-commerce solutions that are tailored precisely to your brand’s unique ethos and operational needs, ensuring a compelling and influential online presence. Additionally, we extend our expertise to omnichannel integrations, equipping brick\\-and\\-mortar locations with state\\-of\\-the\\-art technology to ensure seamless synchronization with online operations, delivering a consistent and unified customer experience across all touchpoints.
 



  




 Job Description
 
 Join SimplSo, a dynamic and innovative boutique eCommerce agency, as a Frontend Developer. We are seeking a creative and skilled individual to help build responsive, user\\-friendly webpages. If you are passionate about crafting seamless user experiences and excited about using cutting\\-edge technology to transform the digital and physical retail spaces, SimplSo is the place for you.
 



  





  





**Responsibilities** 



* Develop and implement front\\-end web code, working closely with web designers and backend developers to create an optimized, responsive experience.
* Utilize Vue.js or React.js to build dynamic interfaces that are efficient and reusable.
* Manage Shopify\\-based platforms to ensure seamless ecommerce functionality.
* Integrate and manage content through Contentful to provide a cohesive digital experience.
* Collaborate with project managers and other team members to meet deadlines and achieve project goals.
* Stay current with industry trends and apply best practices in web design and development.



  




 Requirements
 * Proven experience in frontend development with a strong portfolio of successful projects.
* Expertise in JavaScript frameworks, particularly Vue.js or React.js.
* Strong experience with Shopify and its APIs for custom solutions.
* Proficiency in using Contentful or similar CMS.
* Ability to translate design wireframes into interactive elements with precise visual and functional execution.
* Excellent problem\\-solving skills and the ability to perform in a fast\\-paced environment.
* Strong communication and team collaboration skills.



  





**Good to have** 




  




* Experience with additional programming languages or frameworks is a plus.
* Prior experience in an e\\-commerce development environment.
* Familiarity with agile development methodologies.
* A passion for UI/UX design and improving website usability.



  




 Benefits
 * Competitive salary with quarterly incentive\\-based growth opportunities.
* Full\\-time role with a 5\\-day working week.
* No contractual bonds, providing freedom and flexibility.
* Opportunity to work in a fast\\-paced startup environment, enabling rapid professional growth.
* Be part of a vibrant team that values creativity and innovation.

title: Software Engineer
description:
Join our digital revolution in NatWest Digital X
   

  

 In everything we do, we work to one aim. To make digital experiences which are effortless and secure.
   

  

 So we organise ourselves around three principles: engineer, protect, and operate. We engineer simple solutions, we protect our customers, and we operate smarter.
   

  

 Our people work differently depending on their jobs and needs. From hybrid working to flexible hours, we have plenty of options that help our people to thrive.
   

  

 This role is based in India and as such all normal working days must be carried out in India.
   

  

**Job Description**
 Join us as a Software Engineer
   

  

* This is an opportunity for a driven Software Engineer to take on an exciting new career challenge
* Day\\-to\\-day, you'll build a wide network of stakeholders of varying levels of seniority
* It’s a chance to hone your existing technical skills and advance your career
* We're offering this role at associate level


**What You'll Do**
 In your new role, you’ll engineer and maintain innovative, customer centric, high performance, secure and robust solutions.
   

  

 You’ll be working within a feature team and using your extensive experience to engineer software, scripts and tools that are often complex, as well as liaising with other engineers, architects and business analysts across the platform.
   

  

 You’ll also be:
   

  

* Producing complex and critical software rapidly and of high quality which adds value to the business
* Working in permanent teams who are responsible for the full life cycle, from initial development, through enhancement and maintenance to replacement or decommissioning
* Collaborating to optimise our software engineering capability
* Designing, producing, testing and implementing our working code
* Working across the life cycle, from requirements analysis and design, through coding to testing, deployment and operations


**The Skills You'll Need**
 You’ll need a background in software engineering, software design, architecture, and an understanding of how your area of expertise supports our customers.
   

  

 You’ll also need:
   

  

* Experience of working with development \\& testing tools, bug tracking tools and wikis
* Experience in Java, Microservices, Multithreading and Spring Boot
* Experience of DevOps, Testing and Agile methodology and associated toolsets
* A background in solving highly complex, analytical and numerical problems
* Experience of implementing programming best practice, especially around scalability, automation, virtualisation, optimisation, availability and performance

title: Full Stack Engineer
description:
**Company Description** 





 Skids Health is an innovative health\\-tech company focused on transforming school and family health management through digital\\-first, outcome\\-driven solutions. Our mission is to make preventive healthcare accessible and actionable for children, parents, and schools by leveraging technology, data analytics, and behavioral science. With a platform that bridges clinics, schools, and families, Skids Health delivers end\\-to\\-end care—digitally enabling nutrition tracking, prescription management, and ongoing health engagement for young people.
 




  





**Role Description** 




 This is a full\\-time on\\-site role for a Full Stack Engineer located in Bengaluru. The Full Stack Engineer will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining both front\\-end and back\\-end components of our web applications. Day\\-to\\-day tasks include collaborating with cross\\-functional teams, writing clean and efficient code, debugging and troubleshooting issues, and ensuring the performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications.
 



  





**Qualifications** 



* Experience in Back\\-End Web Development and Front\\-End Development
* Proficiency in Software Development and Full\\-Stack Development
* CI CD, Dev Ops, AWS, GCP exposure
* Strong skills in Cascading Style Sheets (CSS)
* Excellent problem\\-solving abilities and attention to detail
* Ability to work collaboratively within a team
* Relevant experience in the industry is a plus
* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field

title: IoT & Edge Internship
description:
Embedded \\& IoT Intern
 



  





 Location: Hybrid (Office \\+ Remote) Only apply if you can come to office
 



 Duration: 4 Months
 



 Stipend: ₹7,500 per month
 



 Company: Scitech Industries (Kagaku Technology Pvt Ltd)
 



  





 About Us
 



 Scitech Industries is an Industrial IoT \\& Automation startup building real\\-time machine monitoring, predictive maintenance, and AI\\-driven analytics solutions for manufacturing industries.
 



 We are backed by Startup India, selected for LaunchPreneur 2025, and funded under the Startup India Seed Fund Scheme (SISFS).
 



 Our flagship product, the Scitech Edge Device, integrates IoT hardware, edge computing, and AI\\-driven analytics to revolutionize industrial productivity.
 



  





 Role Overview
 



 We are looking for a passionate IoT intern who wants to build the future of Industrial IoT and work on Raspberry Pi\\-based edge computing using AWS Greengrass.
 



 You’ll work directly with the founder and be a part of the core team developing real\\-time AI \\& ML solutions for predictive maintenance and machine analytics.
 



  




* ResponsibilitiesDevelop and deploy AWS Greengrass components on Raspberry Pi\\-based devices
* Integrate sensors, energy meters, barcode scanners, and fingerprint modules
* Stream real\\-time data to AWS IoT Core and our SaaS platform
* Work on AI/ML model integration for edge computing and predictive maintenance
* Debug hardware\\-software integration issues
* Collaborate with the backend team to enable real\\-time monitoring dashboards



  




* Required Skills
 *(We’ll mentor you — passion to learn matters most!)* 
 Must\\-Have:
* Good knowledge of Python
* Familiarity with Raspberry Pi and Linux commands
* Understanding of IoT protocols (MQTT, HTTP, WebSockets)
* Good to Have:
* Exposure to AWS IoT Core / AWS Greengrass
* Knowledge of AI/ML concepts and model deployment
* Experience with sensor data handling or edge computing



  




* What You’ll GainDirect mentorship from the founder and core team involvement
* Hands\\-on experience with IoT hardware, edge computing, and AWS IoT
* Exposure to AI and ML integration for real\\-time analytics
* Opportunity to work on a live industrial SaaS product impacting factories
* Certificate \\+ Letter of Recommendation \\+ Potential PPO for top performers



  




* Who Can ApplyFinal\\-year B.Tech/B.E. students in CSE / ECE / IoT / Robotics
* Recent graduates passionate about IoT, AWS, and AI
* Someone who loves building, experimenting, and solving complex problems



  





 How to Apply
 



 Send your resume and a short write\\-up about your IoT/ML projects (if any) to:
 



 📧 ceo@scitechindustries.com
 



  





 NOTE: Apply only 
 **if you can come to office in gurugram** 
  as this is a 
 **hybrid** 
  internship opportunity.
 



  





  





 Or apply directly via LinkedIn.
 



  




* PerksHybrid work setup — flexibility to work from home when needed
* Be part of a core team driving innovation
* Work on cutting\\-edge Industrial IoT hardware \\+ AI analytics
* Learn directly from real\\-world industry use cases
* Join a fast\\-growing industrial automation startup

title: AI Engineer (FoodTech) (MUMBAI LOCATION)
description:
**Company: LabelBlind®** 




**Role: AI Engineer** 




**Full\\-Time Role. Mumbai, India.** 




**IMMEDIATE joining** 




  





 LabelBlind is India’s 1st digital food labelling company. As a B2B SaaS startup focused on revolutionizing food labeling through innovative software solutions, our mission is to empower food businesses with tools that ensure compliance, accuracy, and efficiency in food labeling. Our suite of software solutions is designed for the food industry, targeting Food Export Companies, Domestic Packed Food Businesses, Food D2C and Ecommerce Companies, Hotels, QSRs, Catering companies, and International Food Companies (primarily in the GCC). Leveraging technologies like React with Redux, Node.js, MongoDB, AWS, computer vision, and large language models (LLMs), we are building smart, user\\-centric solutions.
 



  





 The company is based out of Mumbai, seeking Mumbai based candidates only.
 



  





**Job Description:** 




 We are seeking an experienced and talented AI Engineer to join our dynamic team at a fast\\-growing Food Tech Startup based in Mumbai. As an AI Engineer, you will play a crucial role in developing and deploying innovative AI solutions that enhance our food\\-related services. Your expertise in OCR, computer vision, neural networks, object detection models, NLP, and generative AI will be instrumental in driving our company's success.
 



  





 Role reporting to the VP \\- Engineering.
 



  





**Responsibilities:** 



1. Develop and implement OCR (Optical Character Recognition) systems to extract relevant information from food\\-related documents.
2. Design and train object detection models using state\\-of\\-the\\-art techniques to recognize and categorize food items under relevant data sets.
3. Utilize Natural Language Processing (NLP) techniques to extract insights from text data to improve our understanding of food products and enhance our services.
4. Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams, including software engineers to integrate AI algorithms and models into our existing applications and platforms.
5. Continuously evaluate and improve the performance of existing AI models by conducting rigorous testing, troubleshooting, and implementing enhancements.
6. Participate in code reviews, provide constructive feedback, and maintain high\\-quality code standards to ensure the reliability, scalability, and maintainability of our AI systems.
7. Document your work, including algorithm designs, methodologies, and experiments, to facilitate knowledge sharing and support future development efforts.



  





**Requirements:** 



1. Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
2. Minimum 3 years of practical experience working with OCR, object detection models, NLP, and generative AI in a professional setting.
3. Proficiency in programming languages such as Python and experience with Django frameworks and libraries, including TensorFlow, PyTorch, OpenCV, and NLTK.
4. Experience with ChatGPT prompts to modify data input and output.
5. Solid understanding of machine learning algorithms, deep learning architectures, and statistical modeling techniques.
6. Proven track record of delivering high\\-quality AI solutions within deadlines.



  





 Knowledge of cloud platforms, such as AWS or Google Cloud, and experience with deploying AI models in production environments is a plus.
 



  





**Important :** 



* **Serious candidate with proven credentials and relevant experience only.**
* **Candidates with references will be preferred**
* **Past experience in AI is a MUST.**

title: Engineer / Sr. Engineer - RTOS M/F For Bangalore (H/F) - SAFRAN ELECTRONICS & DEFENSE SERVICES INDIA
description:
Safran est un groupe international de haute technologie opérant dans les domaines de l'aéronautique (propulsion, équipements et intérieurs), de l'espace et de la défense. Sa mission : contribuer durablement à un monde plus sûr, où le transport aérien devient toujours plus respectueux de l'environnement, plus confortable et plus accessible. Implanté sur tous les continents, le Groupe emploie 100 000 collaborateurs pour un chiffre d'affaires de 27,3 milliards d'euros en 2024, et occupe, seul ou en partenariat, des positions de premier plan mondial ou européen sur ses marchés. Safran est la 2ème entreprise du secteur aéronautique et défense du classement « World's Best Companies 2024 » du magazine TIME. Safran Electronics \\& Defense propose à ses clients des solutions d'intelligence embarquée leur permettant d'appréhender l'environnement, de réduire la charge mentale et de garantir une trajectoire, même en situation critique, ce dans tous les environnements : sur terre, en mer, dans le ciel ou l'espace. La société met les expertises de ses 13 000 collaborateurs au service de ces trois fonctions : observer, décider et guider, pour les marchés civils et militaires.
   

  

 Descriptif mission
   

  

 The Software RTOS Engineer, will be responsible for the development of a software assigned perimeter in a strong team of engineers working on hi\\-tech embedded applicative software. You will be part of Software Engineering Department which has multidisciplinary teams across multiple Safran sites working together to provide innovative, future products of high technological value in aeronautical, land and maritime industries. You will work in close collaboration with the Reseach\\&Development headquarters of Safran Electronics and Defense in France. In the short term, you will join a task force dedicated to Low Level Testing. You will have the responsibility of your assigned perimeter of Low Level Testing activities, as a Team member. In this context you will be reporting directly to the Technical Manager and operationally to the Tech Lead. Working with others, you shall responsible for: \\- ensuring the highest level of quality for your deliverables; \\- respecting deadlines provided to you by the Tech Lead; \\- handling the development of your software assigned perimeter by working with other technical stake holders (from MBD, Hardware and/or Product engineering); \\- raising awareness on technical and deadline risks related to your deliverables; \\- assessing your progress and presenting it to the Tech Lead, offering options when requested.
   

  

 Bachelor's / Master's Degree in Electronics / Computers Science Engineering with minimum of 5 years' experience in aerospace industry (of which at least 3 are in an RTOS engineering role); Experience in working in team sizes of 10 and above; You know how to develop embedded software in a low\\-level environment tailored to the aeronautical industry with DO\\-178C; Experience in the processes of software projects in fields constrained by aeronautical standards, or close. You are able to quickly understand technical challenges, including in fields of which you are not an expert of, and are likely to offer solution steps throughout their resolution. Self\\-reliant, you illustrate yourself as a good communicator, dynamic, rigorous, organized, and show an ease in building professional relationships through teamwork. Must have proven experience with: \\- Low Level Testing/Low Level Requirements (like with RTRT/IBM RATIONAL TEST REALTIME STUDIO); \\- Low\\-level software development/architecture (RTOS/Boot/Driver/Dataloader, compilation toolchain, debug tools); \\- Assembly \\& C proficiency. Nice to have experience with: \\- DO\\-178C; \\- Knowledge of RTOS concepts, Real\\-time Services, Communication constraints, CPU \\& memory; \\- Knowledge of embedded networks: CAN, A429, A664, RS4xx, Discrete, PWM, ADC, VDT, Internal mechanisms (DMA, Interruptions); \\- Configuration \\& Change Management.

title: Lead Sharepoint Developer
description:
**Title** 
 – Lead Sharepoint Developer
 



**Position** 
 – Fulltime with our client
 



**Location** 
 – Bangalore
 



**Salary \\- 35LPA** 




  





**Qualifications** 



* 10\\+ years of SharePoint experience, with at least 3\\+ years in a lead role.
* Strong technical skills in SharePoint Online (site design, workflows, integrations).
* Hands\\-on experience with SharePoint administration and development.
* Strong communication and stakeholder management skills.
* Ability to balance roadmap planning with day\\-to\\-day technical execution.



  





**Nice to Have** 



* Experience with PowerApps, Power Automate, and Power BI.
* Familiarity with Teams and the Microsoft 365 suite.
* Knowledge of Agile practices.
